Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey-black in section, the interior is partly covered with a black resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of one line of red-painted text, writ large.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394429) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394429)
